Getting To Monarch Educational Foundation

How To Get Here

Monarch Educational Foundation is situated in the eastern region of Ibadan which gives quick access to Challenge, and Akobo.


London’s Office is around two hours away from a bus station going directly to Monarch Educational Foundation , A Number of bike are within easy reach, providing direct links to locations around Ibadan.

Travel Information

Private Car

Monarch can be reach via a public bus or a private vehicle. from london’s office, 50 meters from Total Garden.There is a road going south. going straight through that route will get you to Orita-Challenge. Monarch is less than 10 Minutes drive from Orita-Chalenge.

Taxi

Monarch can be reach via a public bus or a private vehicle. from london’s office, 50 meters from Total Garden.There is a road going south. going straight through that route will get you to Orita-Challenge. Monarch is less than 10 Minutes drive from Orita-Chalenge.
